sentence.Network_en: Saturate the meat in the mixture of oil and herbs.
sentence.Network_cn: 把肉浸泡在油和作料的卤汁里.

sentence.Network_en: We'll saturate California with the rise in its crime rate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将使加利福尼亚州的犯罪案件增长率达到饱和点.

sentence.Network_en: To saturate with water and make soggy or unusable.
sentence.Network_cn: 吸取过量用水浸透使湿润或不能用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词立体记忆 ... → unsatisfactory 令人不满意的 → saturate 使饱和，使充满；浸透 → saturation 饱和状态，浸透.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... ) satiate v 使充分满足 ) saturate v 使饱和 ) descend v 下降；传下.
英语专业八级核心词汇_普特英语听力 ... satiety n 过饱 saturate v 使饱和浸透使充满 schism n (政治组织等的)分裂教派.
消防专业词汇英语翻译(P-Z) ... satellite 机动增援车 saturate 使浸透 saturated air 饱和空气.

list.abs: AE中英文对照 ... Hue → 色相位 Saturation → 饱和度 Color → 颜色.
* 全屏抗锯齿(full-screen anti-aliasing(FSAA))* 颜色纠正(color correction)以及各种滤镜(color-shift)特效，包括跳跃漂白(bleach bypass)，过饱和(saturation)，去饱和(de-saturation).对一个游戏引擎来说，拥有一个特效系统来按理所有的粒子，贴花，还有其它特效的特殊渲染是常见的。粒子和贴.
岩土力学与工程 5 - 大观园的日志 - 网易博客 ... saturation zone 饱和区 saturator 饱和器 scabbling 凿花；粗琢.
石油词汇英语翻译(S) ... saturable 可饱和的 saturant 饱和剂 saturate record 饱和记录.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... saturation n 饱和 saturated a 饱和的 ascend v 登上，爬上.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective in the sense satisfied): from Latin saturat- 'filled, glutted', from the verb saturare, from satur 'full'. The early sense of the verb (mid 16th cent.) was 'satisfy'; the noun dates from the 1950s

entry.def: If people or things saturate a place or object, they fill it completely so that no more can be added.

example.ex: In the last days before the vote, both sides are saturating the airwaves...
example.tran: 选举前最后几天，竞选双方占用了所有的广播电台和电视台。

example.ex: As the market was saturated with goods and the economy became more balanced, inflation went down.
example.tran: 随着市场上商品饱和，经济趋于平衡，通货膨胀就减弱了。

entry.def: If someone or something is saturated, they become extremely wet.

example.ex: If the filter has been saturated with motor oil, it should be discarded and replaced.
example.tran: 过滤器如果已被机油浸透，则应丢弃并换上新的。

means.word_mean: 1. cause (a chemical compound, vapour, solution, magnetic material, etc.) to unite with the greatest possible amount of another substance

auth_sentence.content: Standups saturate Twitter, devising new comedy forms within a hundred and forty characters.
auth_sentence.res_content: Standups saturate Twitter, devising new comedy forms within a hundred and forty characters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Standups saturate Twitter, devising new comedy forms within a hundred and forty characters.

auth_sentence.content: I say the Milky Way is storing neutrinos that then saturate to the point of discharge which results in a nonlocality event.
auth_sentence.res_content: I say the Milky Way is storing neutrinos that then saturate to the point of discharge which results in a nonlocality event.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I say the Milky Way is storing neutrinos that then saturate to the point of discharge which results in a nonlocality event.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 渗透的, 饱和的, 深颜色的
stems_affixes.word_buile: saturate使充满,使饱和+ed……的→adj.渗透的, 饱和的, 深颜色的
saturate使充满,使饱和+ion表名词→n.饱和[状态];浸透

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使湿透,浸透;使充满,使饱和
stems_affixes.word_buile: satur足够,饱足+ate使……→使足够→饱和

sentences.en: Melting, nose-tingling odors saturate the kitchen, suffuse the house, drift out to the world on puffs of chimney smoke.
sentences.cn: 甘美的、挑逗鼻孔的香味浸透了厨房，弥漫到屋子里，又随着一阵阵炊烟飘向外面的世界。

means.word_mean: 使…大量吸收或充满某物

sentences.en: The market has been saturated with paintings like that.

jushi.english: Lies and war cries saturated that fascist newspaper.
jushi.chinese: 那份法西斯报纸充斥着谎言和战争叫嚣。

jushi.english: After planting these seeds, saturate the earth round them.
jushi.chinese: 播下这些种子以后,把周围的土浇透水。

jushi.english: His shirt was saturated in blood.
jushi.chinese: 他的衬衫被鲜血浸透了。
